item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Yeah, use cases… Add the cases under

OBJECT CLICK ONE

Use this format…

case OBJECTID: if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { sendMessage("YOU'RE MESSAGE"); teleportToX = XCOORDS; teleportToY = YCOORDS; } break;

item.title: Problems With Telly Portals In Varrock
item.dc:creator: @Khasck Khasck
item.description:
@Khasck wrote:

I Have Recently Been Updating My Server, And I Put A New Training Area In The Wild, Which Had Portals In It, But The Portals Don’t Work.
I Also Coded Portals And Put Them In Varrock, But They Don’t Work Either.
Its Not The Coding, Or Atleast I Don’t Think It Is.
But Anyways, Heres The Coding I Used For The Portals:

in Client.java I Put In:

Addaobject(3155,3673,2467,0,10,0);// W Portal 1 Addaobject(3157,3673,2467,0,10,0);// W Portal 2 Addaobject(3159,3673,2467,0,10,0);// W Portal 3 Addaobject(3252,3430,2467,0,10,0);// V Portal 1 Addaobject(3250,3430,2467,0,10,0);// V Portal 2 Addaobject(3254,3430,2467,0,10,0);// V Portal 3 Addaobject(3256,3430,2467,0,10,0);// V Portal 4

and also in Client.Java I Put In:

                          if (objectX == 3155 && objectY == 3673) // Wild Training Portal 1
                          {
                          teleportToX = 3252;
                          teleportToY = 3430;
                          }
                          if (objectX == 3157 && objectY == 3673) // Wild Training Portal 2
                          {
                          teleportToX = 2764;
                          teleportToY = 2766;
                          }
                          if (objectX == 3159 && objectY == 3673) // Wild Training Portal 3 
                          {
                          teleportToX = 2480;
                          teleportToY = 5172;
                          }
                          if (objectX == 3252 && objectY == 3430) // Varrock Portal 1
                          {
                          teleportToX = 3252;
                          teleportToY = 3430;
                          }
                          if (objectX == 3250 && objectY == 3430) // Varrock Portal 2
                          {
                          teleportToX = 2480;
                          teleportToY = 5172;
                          }
                          if (objectX == 3254 && objectY == 3430) // Varrock Portal 3
                          {
                          teleportToX = 2764;
                          teleportToY = 2766;
                          }
                          if (objectX == 3256 && objectY == 3430) // Varrock Portal 4
                          {
                          teleportToX = 3384;
                          teleportToY = 3215;
                          }

so, could yall tell me if it was bad coding, or what?
i just don’t really know what the matter is.
if you want to get on the server and see for yourself, the IP is 5.140.140.63
the himachi network is Saradomin Scape
pass is 123
port is default

Thanks to anyone that can help me

-Will

Read full topic
